# spaceR

Tools for spatial sampling

## Installation

You can install the development version of eaTools from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("NINAnor/spaceR")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`nested_balanced_samples()`](https://ninanor.github.io/spaceR/reference/nested_balanced_samples.md)
  : Nested, balanced, and spatially well-spread stratified samples
